<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.74</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - Tree View </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns string data from item on given path. IDC means id of parent Tree View. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''tvData''' [idc, [path]] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [idc, [path]]: [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> idc: [[Number]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> [path]: [[Array]] - Array containing numbers. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER3</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value> 
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> control '''tvData''' [path] </value></part><part><name>Alternative Syntax</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> control: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER21</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [path]: [[Array]] - Array containing numbers. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER22</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[String]] - (as above). </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
